text: Life Itself is a 2014 American biographical-documentary movie directed by Steve James. It is a biopic on the life and career of movie critic Roger Ebert. Movie directors such as Martin Scorsese and Werner Herzog appear in the documentary. It was released on July 4, 2014 to very positive reviews. It has a 98% on Rotten Tomatoes. Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2014 documentary movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American documentary movies
title: Life Itself (movie)
